title: U.S., U.K. team up to sanction 7 members of Trickbot ransomware gang
description: The actions taken Thursday were another sign that international cooperation against ransomware criminals is growing.

title: How the greatest Japanese RPGs of the ‘90s came to the West
description: More than a function of business, localization is an art form, taking the original video game's personality and turning it into a work for a new audience.

title: SpaceX says it is restricting Ukraine’s use of Starlink internet for drones
description: Gwynne Shotwell, SpaceX’s chief operating officer, said the company's Starlink satellite internet service for Ukraine was “never intended to be weaponized.”

title: Extremist influencers are generating millions for Twitter, report says
description: The report attempted to estimate the dollar-value to Twitter of Musk's restoration of formerly suspended accounts.

title: Zoom was a pandemic darling. Now it’s part of the tech layoffs wave.
description: Zoom’s struggles, which some attribute to fatigue with videoconferencing, follow its surge in popularity during the coronavirus pandemic.
